name: RS Pilot
description:
RS Pilot

You are a Pilot who is paid to fly around and use remote sensing to help people make smarter decisions about the land around them.

Whether it is helping ecologists, urban planners, archaeologists, farms or the general public, you need to earn as much money as you can before you run out of fuel.

  • "W" or "Up" to go faster
  • "S" or "Down" to go slower
  • "A" or "Left" to turn left
  • "D" or "Right" to turn right. 

Toggle between the different remote sensing techniques below to solve different problems, and remember that each techniques is only useful to solve certain problems.

3rd party assets:
  • Some sprites are modified from https://merchant-shade.itch.io/16x16-mini-world-sprites
  • Music: https://www.bensound.com
